name: Rhythm Roo!
description:
Rhythm Roo is a one-button rhythm game accesable to players with low or no vision. The game is fully playable and navagatable with only audio, while also providing visual features to assist players with partial vision.

Please note: Text-to-speech is only supported on Windows 64-bit systems.
